message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique product. I believe you'll find it valuable and worth the investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $1700000. Can you meet me at that price?

I'm glad we're close, Bob. I can see you're serious about acquiring the product. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to ensure I get a price that reflects the product's value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1900000.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $1750000. Can you meet me at that price?
